name: Space Dice (gmrm)
description:
Controls:

Mouse to move

Space Bar to shoot special

My first game as a submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2022!

A (really) short experience about dices fighting aliens in space!

Literally roll the dice and use your RNG powers as a space d2, d4 or d6 with a random set of weapons!

Hope you all enjoy and feedbacks are always appreciated :)
